DOC.brief_summary: Women are followed prospectively for 3 months, recording headaches, other symptoms, and menstrual periods. Those with menstrual migraine are treated perimenstrually with eletriptan for 3 months.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Survey of Menstrual Migraine & Prevention With Eletriptan
DOC.detailed_description: Women are followed prospectively for 3 months, recording headaches, other symptoms, and menstrual periods. Those with menstrual migraine are treated perimenstrually with eletriptan for 3 months.
DOC.criteria: age 1845 healthy menstruating female cardiac or other conditions precluding use of eletriptan
